document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Glory's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">sufficiency </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">makes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">trying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">poor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Because he loves her
